name: Starcraft: Ascendency
description:
![](<https://media-elerium.cursecdn.com/attachments/160/940/SCAscendencyCover2.png> =1200x750)



WARNING: THIS CAMPAIGN CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR SC2 LOTV!!!

This campaign takes place during the two-year time span between the end of the "Amon's Fall" mission and the "Homecoming" cinematic, covering what happened to Kerrigan during this period (and why it took 2 years for her to return).

This campaign will likely be between 10 and 15 missions, and missions will be released every few months.

Thank you to Bilxor, EDHRIANO, CybrosX, and Hultmanable for testing Mission 1!

Instructions:

1\. Download the Ascendency mod (needed for missions 3 and onward)

2\. Place the mod in your SC mods folder (should be in program files)

3\. Download the mission you want to play

4\. Launch it in the editor

Special thanks to CybrosX for making some custom models for Missions 2 and 3! Check out his model showcase here!

[CybrosX's Model Showcase](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/development/artist-tavern/125735-cybros-x-model-showcase/#p10>)
author: _ForgeUser25303397
